body_html:
@hamidfarhid Well, there are some errors in the code when the 0.2.0 conda package is previously compiled. You can try to compile the new package yourself (using the windows-full branch), use the WHL package compiled by AppVeyor CI, or wait until the commits are fully merged.
I've tested the new code using MNIST, monitored the memory usage and saw no memory leak using 4 num_workers. Also it passes the dataloader test. Maybe you can try the new version.

body:
@hamidfarhid Well, there are some errors in the code when the 0.2.0 conda package is previously compiled. You can try to compile the new package yourself (using the windows-full branch), use the WHL package compiled by AppVeyor CI, or wait until the commits are fully merged. 
I've tested the new code using MNIST, monitored the memory usage and saw no memory leak using 4 num_workers. Also it passes the dataloader test. Maybe you can try the new version.
